instruction: Provide a short summary of the following book review.
input:
Book: The Hunger Games
Book Review:
The Hunger Games follows sixteen-year-old Katniss Everdeen, as she struggles to survive the annual Hunger Games, a fight to the death amongst twenty-four teenagers. Not only must she battle the other players, but she must also fight against the oppressive Capitol that controls her fate.
output: The Hunger Games is a novel about sixteen-year-old Katniss Everdeen who participates in the annual Hunger Games, a fight to the death amongst twenty-four teenagers. Katniss not only must battle the other players, but also the oppressive Capitol that controls her fate.
